CIRCULAR No.16 /2008 
 
SUBJECT:- ACCESS OF VEHICLES UPTO THE AIRCRAFT AT CIVIL 
AIRPORTS IN THE COUNTRY ON MEDICAL GROUNDS. 
 
 
 
 
 HH Jagadguru Sri Balagangadharanatha Mahswamiji,  is permitted to avail 
facility of Airport Operator’s ambulance/ferry vehicle to and from aircraft, during 
arrival and departure, at all civil airports in the country for a period of one year, 
on medical grounds with immediate effect.
